Fixing the double digital skills gap for Māori communities: Lee Timutimu https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/fixing-the-double-digital-skills-gap-for-maori-communities-lee-timutimu/I6QM7VC6JJGD5GAXZUWUDOJ24E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/fixing-the-double-digital-skills-gap-for-maori-communities-lee-timutimu/I6QM7VC6JJGD5GAXZUWUDOJ24E/ Lee TimutimuOPINION: While AI should be for everyone, we’re still a long way away from this being true Thu, 05 Sep 2024 22:00:00 +0000 Lee Timutimu says we’re still working on our access to basic digital skills within most indigenous communities.

Thu, 05 Sep 2024 21:57:00 +0000 Tests showed a single dose of a new product reduced a cow's planet-heating methane emissions by three-quarters for 100 days. Photo / RNZ / Rebekah Parsons-King
Police arrest two men after illegal activities at two vehicle-dismantlers’ yards https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-arrest-two-men-after-illegal-activities-at-two-vehicle-dismantlers-yards/RR2Z2NYSMRD5NP5P6BJUV247CQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-arrest-two-men-after-illegal-activities-at-two-vehicle-dismantlers-yards/RR2Z2NYSMRD5NP5P6BJUV247CQ/ A 21-year-old from Upper Hutt and a 39-year-old from Christchurch were arrested. Thu, 05 Sep 2024 21:48:12 +0000 Police have arrested two men and are taking restraint action under the Criminal Proceeds (Recovery) Act 2009 after investigating illegal activities at two auto-dismantlers yards. Photo / NZ Police
